name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
schedule:
1.		Orientation
2.		Franz Kafka, “The Metamorphosis” (1915)
3.		Franz Kafka, “The Metamorphosis” 
4.		Herman Melville, “Bartleby, the Scrivener” (1853)
5.		Herman Melville, “Bartleby, the Scrivener”
6.		F. Scott Fitzgerald, “Winter Dreams” (1922)
7.		William Dean Howells, “Editha” (1905)
8.		Review and discussion
9.		Mid-term week
10.		Washington Irving, “Rip Van Winkle” (1819)
11.		Washington Irving, “Rip Van Winkle”
12.		Guy de Maupassant, "The Necklace" (1884)
13.		Guy de Maupassant, "The Necklace"
14.		Willa Cather, “Neighbour Rosicky” (1928)
15.		Raymond Carver, “Cathedral” (1981)
16.		Edgar Allan Poe, “The Murders in the Rue Morgue” (1841)
17.		Edgar Allan Poe, “The Murders in the Rue Morgue”
18.		Final week
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 15%
Assignment: 20%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 35%
